title: CSIP
short: Want to prepare for the world of Computer Science careers? Join us for CSIP!

title: ICPC
short: Want a fun and rewarding way to show and improve your programming skills? Come compete with us at ICPC!

title: GBM #20
short: Are you interested in building natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase? Then, join us today with GDG Athens at 6:30pm in Boyd 322 for a workshop on Flutter, open to ALL interested students!!

title: GBM #19
short: Join ACM to learn about Spring Boot!
